text: [Bo vuçudi in ojoti ravşan] ʙarxe az mardum hamtojoni ƣajr az Allohro [ʙaroi parastiş] ʙarmeguzinand va onhoro hamcun Alloh taolo dūst medorand, vale kasone, ki imon ovardaand, Allohro ʙeştar dūst dorand va onon, ki [ʙo şirku irtikoʙi gunohon] sitam kardand, hangome ki azoʙi [qijomat] – ro ʙuʙinand, [xohand donist], ki tamomi qudrat az oni Alloh taolo ast va in ki Alloh taolo saxtkajfar ast
